change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: England's family was in Mexico in 1910 during the Revolution; in the 1920s and 1930s, they operated the Alamo Guest Ranch near Magdalena, Sonora. Collection includes reminiscenses of life at the Alamo Ranch during the 1920s; as well as stories of family experiences during the period of the Mexican Revolution. Includes a floor plan of the ranch house, and a short list of guests at the ranch.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: England's family was in Mexico in 1910 during the Revolution; in the 1920s and 1930s, they operated the Alamo Guest Ranch near Magdalena, Sonora.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Reminiscenses of life at the Alamo Ranch during the 1920s; as well as stories of family experiences during the period of the Mexican Revolution. Includes a floor plan of the ranch house, and a short list of guests at the ranch.
